comment: waste fellow. Always shouting on me, without any reason, maine last trip miss kar di nightout club ke sath, but its ok, apn fir chl lenge. And get married soon before me. waste fellow. don't overthink ok. call me whenever you need me.
name: Kajal Yadav

comment: Hey, gonna miss teaming up for the training placement cell. Hope you find some awesome pals down the road who really appreciate your time.
name: Azaharuddin

comment: Hey Pavan,thanks for everything that you have done for me. Sweet and genuine guy who know how to take care of people, knowingly or unknowingly how those people will treat you back. Your contribution as a TPC member is unremarkable. If South is your Destiny for sure you will get it soon. All the best
name: Prasanna Bairagi

comment:
You never leave any stone unturned. You always try to invlove everyone in every plan you make. Many memories are made because of the effort you put in convincing people. We went through ups & downs, but all for the better now. 

You will shine wherever you go. Wishing you the best!! 
Stay in touch..
name: Vignesh R
